channel.title: Help with Simba?
channel.description:
Hey im new here and I've looked around on the forums for this but still couldn't find it... I copied and pasted some scripts into Simba and I selected the rs client i had open and I clicked run, but an error popped up:
Exception in Script: Unable to find file 'SRL/SRL.scar' used from ''
I'm using akward miner or whatever it's called any help is appreciated thanks!

item.title: Help with Simba?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

  1. scroll down and post in the simba section
  2. turn on the SRL extension
  3. Update the SRL extension.

Read full topic
